data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of hawker dragonfly of uncertain affinities from the Middle Jurassic of China (Odonata: Aeshnoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Yongjun, Nel, André, Ren, Dong, Pang, Hong (2011): A new genus and species of hawker dragonfly of uncertain affinities from the Middle Jurassic of China (Odonata: Aeshnoptera). Zootaxa 2927: 57-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201571
